name: Sun Fire
description: Blast an enemy with a charge of radiant heat, dealing 1161 Flame Damage, and an additional 2310 Flame Damage over 10 seconds.  Upon activation you gain Major Savagery and Major Prophecy, increasing your Weapon and Spell Critical rating by 2629.
